mapper.sql: select a.*, u.label "uid_label", g.label "gid_label", cat.label "cat_label", phase.label "phase_label", topic.subject "topic_subject", org.label "org_label", person.label "person_label" from sdoc a left join "user" u on a.uid=u.id left join "group" g on a.gid=g.id left join cat on a.cat=cat.id left join phase on a.phase=phase.id left join topic on a.topic=topic.id left join org on a.org=org.id left join person on a.person=person.id

select a.*, u.label "uid_label", g.label "gid_label", cat.label "cat_label", phase.label "phase_label", topic.subject "topic_subject", org.label "org_label", person.label "person_label",
y.id "y_id", y.priority "y_priority", y.flags "y_flags", y.state "y_state", y.t0 "y_t0", y.t1 "y_t1", y.art "y_art", y.olabel "y_olabel", y.ospec "y_ospec", y.qty "y_qty", y.price "y_price", y.comment "y_comment", y.footnote "y_footnote", art.label "y_art_label",
d.id "d_id", d.state "d_state", d.t0 "d_t0", d.t1 "d_t1", d.op "d_op", d.subject "d_subject", d.text "d_text", d.form "d_form", d.args "d_args", d.cat "d_cat", d.phase "d_phase", d.shipdest "d_shipdest", d.shipper "d_shipper", d.shipment "d_shipment", d.shipcost "d_shipcost", d.qty "d_qty", d.total "d_total" from sdoc a left join "user" u on a.uid=u.id left join "group" g on a.gid=g.id left join cat on a.cat=cat.id left join phase on a.phase=phase.id left join topic on a.topic=topic.id left join org on a.org=org.id left join person on a.person=person.id left join sentry y on a.id=y.doc left join art on y.art=art.id left join dldoc d on a.id=d.sdoc
mapper.select: insert into sdoc( priority, flags, state, uid, gid, mode, acl, t0, t1, op, subject, text, form, args, cat, phase, topic, org, person, qty, total ) values( #{priority}, #{flags}, #{state}, #{owner.id}, #{ownerGroup.id}, #{accessMode}, #{acl}, #{beginDate}, #{endDate}, #{op.id}, #{subject}, #{text}, #{form.id}, #{formArgs}, #{category.id}, #{phase.id}, #{topic.id}, #{org.id}, #{person.id}, #{quantity}, #{total} ) returning id
